reviews.text: Arrowhead Roofing is a trustworthy  company for all your roofing needs. Judson could not have been more patient, accommodating, and professional. His attention to detail to do the job right made a big difference in the fantastic outcome. I have had many compliments on my roof and gutters since then. If you want the job done right, contact Arrowhead for a worry free and pleasant experience.  So glad we chose Arrowhead Roofing.
Fantastic job!   Thank you Arrowhead Roofing.  Gary and Zach were great.  Very professional.  I would recommend them to anyone.  Our home is beautiful.

I recently had the pleasure of working with Arrowhead Roofing to replace my roof, and I can’t say enough about the outstanding job they did! From start to finish, their team was professional, efficient, and truly dedicated to delivering top-notch results.
The process began with a thorough consultation where they took the time to explain my options, answer all my questions, and provide a clear, competitive quote with no hidden surprises. Their expertise was evident, and I felt confident in their

The Arrowhead Roofing team did a great job. The roof looks beautiful. Everyone we dealt with was very polite and professional. The team cleaned up our Property when the job is complete. A word will recommend them to others.

Trustworthy and they did a great job! The roof looks fantastic and Judson even came and talked with the insurance adjuster to make sure my claim would be accepted. He went above(roof) and beyond, pun intended.

Arrowhead has helped us with our fence, roof replacement, and solar screens.   Before Brad said our roof needed to be replaced, he had been on it several times after hailstorms.   Each time, he came down and said that the roof was still in good shape.   Finally, after the hail storm in the spring of 2024, he came down and said that the roof needed to be replaced.  His company put a beautiful roof on and replaced our gutters to match.  The fence still looks great a year after it was stained.  The

We’ve had the pleasure of working with Arrowhead Roofing several times over the years, and they’ve gone above and beyond every single time. Not only has Brad replaced our roof three times (each time with excellent workmanship and attention to detail), but he’s also stepped in to help with so much more — from fixing our sprinkler system and addressing water damage inside the house to painting our entire home as we prepared to list it for sale.

I had great experience with Arrowhead Roofing/Daniel Eubanks. Daniel and his team has been phenomenal helping me repair/getting a new roof for my house as well as other services- gutters and window services. Team was honest, straightforward and provided expedited services. Thank you for a well done job. Daniel, you’re been above and beyond with this process. I appreciate your help. Will definitely use your service again in the future.
Kay Pendleton

Arrowhead roofing handled my hail claim from March of 2024 and did an excellent job!  After the contract was signed, all work was quickly scheduled and completed. All of the contractors were very professional and did outstanding work. All areas were cleaned thoroughly after work was completed. What really impressed me was working with the back office on getting small details addressed and supplemental estimates processed with my insurance company. The process ran very smoothly and communication

We had a full roof installation and Judson and staff did a great job! As a contractor/supplier myself, I really appreciate the communication, workmanship, and value for dollar. Crew meet schedule and team exceeded expectations. Highly recommended Arrowhead Roofing!

Daniel from Arrowhead visited my home to assess potential damage from a recent hailstorm in our area. Throughout the evaluation and the entire process, Daniel and the Arrowhead team demonstrated exceptional professionalism and a commitment to excellence. The project was a resounding success, and I’m truly thankful we chose Arrowhead. A project manager can make or break a job, and Daniel absolutely crushed it with his attention to detail, insight, and communication.

This Team did an awesome job! They took care of our roof, gutters and windows replacements. Gary was so patient, answered all our questions with a great professionalism and helped with problems with the insurance company. We highly recommend them!

Arrowhead did an amazing job on our home! They replaced our roof, upgraded the fence and pergola, added solar screens, poured a new concrete slab, painted the exterior, and more. Every part of the project was handled with professionalism, great communication, and outstanding customer service. The team was responsive, respectful, and made sure we were satisfied every step of the way. The house looks fantastic, and the quality of work exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend Arrowhead for any h

Arrowhead is seriously wonderful. From start to finish they were so professional, helpful, and accommodating. They did an excellent job. They are trustworthy, and I felt they truly cared. They handled the entire project, even the parts that weren’t their responsibility, and everything was so seamless, easy, and stress free. I highly recommend them and will continue to use them in the future.

We had a fantastic experience working with Brad from Arrowhead Roofing. From start to finish, he was communicative, responsive, and incredibly efficient and professional. Brad always did exactly what he said he would, followed up promptly, and was easy to reach any time we had a question. Just a salt of the earth guy.  He also worked seamlessly with our insurance company, which made the whole process much less stressful.

The roof looks great, and there wasn’t a single nail left behind. Several
Judson with Arrowhead made the insurance claim process seamless and easy! Roof and gutters look amazing! Highly recommend!

I’ve known Brad & Judson for a few years.  They’ve replaced my roof twice in a 2 week period of time.  (Weather) These guys are absolutely the best!   Excellent communication, workmanship and top tier products.

I trust Arrow Head roofing, Brad & Judson with any project I need or want.  Don’t look elsewhere!

We have used Arrowhead roofing twice so far for fence repair. They came out quick and helped make sure our fence would not get more damage. The first time they fixed our fence they fixed a problem two other companies had tried and the solution did not work, Arrowhead fixed it and our gate still works. They are quick to respond and do the work. They are reasonably priced and our first call when we need something.

Arrowhead replaced an old, leaning, dragging wooden gate between two parts of our back yard. They did a great job.

The gate is perfect- concreted steel pole frame, very pretty cedar pickets, a good-quality latch, all well-constructed. It’s very sturdy and I expect it will last a long time and won’t sag like the gate that got replaced

Arrowhead’s price was reasonable and we are very happy we used them.

Had my roof replaced about 1yr ago and have nothing but great things to say about Arrowhead. I started initially with getting screens done for my home windows. Brad did amazing work. And if he did not offered the free roof inspection, I wouldn’t have not known it had hail damage.
Judson and Brad were on top of the process handling with my insurance company, and all the way with the roof replacement.They were there every step of the way. Hands down will vouch and recommend them to whom is looking

Excellent!! I don’t even know where to start. I had an all around great experience with Arrowhead, but more specifically Tanner. He went over and beyond for our family. I almost lost my daughter in law and he sent me cookies!! What!!! Who does that? I have no other affiliation with him either. The service was great and thorough. I love the quality of the product, and let me tell you, it does the job! The curiosity that was shown to me is not something I see much of anymore. I would recommend the

I’m a GC and this company is prompt, clean, and fast! Not a single piece of trash to be found at completion. They have completed Senior Housing Villas (30 units), an Assisted Living Facility (40,000 SF), and now have been accepted as our roofer on our soon coming Nursing Facility (40,000 SF).  Great team! and easy to work with.

I had a great experience with Arrowhead Roofing. They provided a timely and competitive quote, and their professionalism throughout the entire process was top-notch. Communication was clear, and the crew was punctual and respectful.  I highly recommend them to anyone in need of reliable and professional roofing services.

Arrowhead not only took care of our roof, gutters & fence after bad hail/wind last yr (2024) but their work & solar screens really elevated the aesthetic of our home. Their team was communicative, efficient & diligent in each part of the job. Now our roof is safe & reliable & our dinged up fence, gutters & screens are no longer eye-sores!

Needed a new roof from wind and hail damage.  Arrowhead came out and gave me an estimate and got started the next week.  They had my roof completely finished in two days and that was with adding a new decking. I also had some painting and wood repair done and I have been so pleased with the job that they did. I felt like the estimate they gave me was very reasonable and the final price was exactly what they said. I would highly recommend arrowhead

The attention to detail & customer service far exceeded our expectations!!  This is our 4th roof in 10 years & by far the best experience & the best work.  The owner, Brad is an absolute pleasure to deal with & he goes above & beyond to ensure everything is done to the highest standards.

Arrowhead Roofing did an outstanding job with my solar screens. We are so excited that we chose them after we looked at options. They were prompt on time and actually very good at measuring the screens and making sure we had the right ones. I was surprised how affordable they were too I’ve already recommended them to two of my family members, and I would recommend them to you.

They were very professional. They came to inspect the windows, suggested different options and came back within 3 weeks to install the solar screens on our living room and office windows which get a lot of AM sun. So far very happy with the screens, they stop quite a bit of the heat and sunlight. Would recommend to our friends and family.

We couldn't be happier with Brad and his team at Arrowhead! They replaced our roof last year. We liked working them with so much, we also hired them to remodel our master bathroom with the shower of our dreams. Brad is incredibly professional and responsive, something we very much appreciate as customers. A+ 100% satisfied

We had them out to do solar screens on our 100 year old house, it was a great experience. Knowledgeable and professional, the measurements were precise and the fit and look were great. Noticed a huge difference right away on the west facing side of the house. Since this was such a great experience we had them come back out to check a couple areas of the roof and they did a great job on the repairs and updating us on anything they saw. Not trying to upsell or provide something that was not needed

Arrowhead Roofing did a fantastic job. They were honest, efficient and delivered what they promised. The owner Judson is hands on and was great to work with! We have nothing but praises for this company and have recommended them many times!

I highly recommend Arrowhead Roofing for anyone in need of roofing services. From start to finish, their team was professional, efficient, and incredibly easy to work with. The employees were courteous, knowledgeable, and took the time to answer all my questions thoroughly. It’s clear they take pride in their work and genuinely care about their customers.

Great company to do business with. We had our roof replaced in August 2024.  They did a great job and the work and cleanup was thorough.  We had an issue in December where    heavy rains leaked into our garage.  They stood behind their work and made sure to address the issue no matter how long it took.  Thanks guys!

Wonderful company, friendly and helpful staff, amazingly fast work.  Gutters removed one day, old shingles removed in the morning - new shingles on in the afternoon. New gutters on the next day. Absolutely no debris left around. No shingle trimmings, no loose nails.  Everything clean and tight and intact. Terrific job.

I hired Arrowhead last year to come and replace all our screen’s to fit our size windows. They came measured and had my custom screens just days later and at an amazing price all installed.  Highly recommend this company. I will be back again. Thank you!  :)

Everything was so smooth and easy. I was so unsure about finding a roofing company that had integrity and honesty and was so happy with David and his team. The work was done so quick and no debris was left which I really appreciated!

Awesome company! Brad and the team are hands down the best. They are highly recommended in any neighborhood. Quality of work is great. The best thing is the people and how they treat you. They are honest and commit to their word.

We really enjoyed Arrowhead putting our home back together after the hail storm. They communicated  everything very well, followed through and delivered. Special thanks to Chris Marchant he made the process very smooth. I will definitely use them in the future.

I had a great experience using this company. The solar screens I had installed are wonderful. The service was excellent, they were patient and understanding when I asked them to come back and install a lighter shade to allow more light in. Highly recommend this company!

Arrowhead Roofing did a fantastic job on our home!  We had many elements to our project, and they handled all of them beyond our expectations.  Excellent communication, and we will definitely use them again!

Arrowhead is my trusted partner for all commercial roofing projects. From start to finish, their professionalism, reliability, and attention to detail set them apart. They are, without a doubt, the best company I’ve had the pleasure of working with.

Arrowhead did my solar screens and they did an awesome job. Very professional folks. Fair prices, great communication, on-time installation. Highly recommended if you need solar screens or roofing services

I went into my roofing adventure assuming it would be easy peasy. It’s Texas, insurance companies know what happens to roofs here. I was WRONG! My insurance company was incredibly difficult and fought us on everything. But Arrowhead went to battle for me. They never gave up fighting for what was right. Communication was outstanding! I was never confused, in the dark, or left hanging. Brad went above and beyond for our family and I never doubted he’d get it done. Arrowhead isn’t just a company, t

If you are looking for a contractor  that shows up on time and provides high quality workmanship at a competitive price then Arrowhead Roofing will not let you down.
Legendary customer service!
Huge thank you to Mike and his crews.

Brad and his team at Arrowhead are top notch!  They made the entire process of getting a new roof seamless.  The quality of their work and professionalism are unmatched.  I recommend them and will use again.

It’s been 2 years since we have had solar screens installed and remain pleased with Arrowhead’s product and workmanship. They were also creative with a viable solution to mount a screen without compromising one of our windows.

The contractors were on time they cleaned up well. When I had a question or concern Judson was quick to respond, and all issues were corrected immediately. My roof and gutters look great and the process overall was seamless. I have recommended to many friends and neighbors.

Had a great experience working with Arrowhead Gabe was amazing. Was ready to answer any questions no matter the time. One of the best customer service. Recommend these guys if you have any issues with your roof.

Brad Allen and his team are the best. Several projects were completed - more to come - and always makes sure its done correctly.  I would highly recommend Brad and Arrowhead for any projects around your home - roof, fencing, sheds, concrete etc... I will never use another company besides Arrowhead again.

We worked directly with Leonard Biemer while having Areowhead install a metal roof on both our family home and the guest house on our small farm. He was a delight to work with and so very knowledgeable about and made the process flawless for us. We love our roofs and are so glad we went with metal roofing. 10 out of 10 recommended.
